meanings.definition: A single surface or side of an object.
meanings.sent1: The cube has six unifaces, each with a different color.
meanings.sent2: The coin has two unifaces, one with the head of a president and the other with a building.
meanings.sent3: I tried drawing a smiley face on each uniface of the dice, but it looked strange.
meanings.sent4: Her unifaces reflected the light differently, creating a mesmerizing effect.
meanings.sent5: The unifaces of the crystal were so smooth and shiny, they seemed almost magical.

meanings.definition: A person or thing with only one face or surface.
meanings.sent1: The mask was designed with a single uniface to give it a mysterious look.
meanings.sent2: The mirror showed her unifaces, one serious and the other smiling.
meanings.sent3: The robot's unifaces made it hard to tell if it was happy or sad.
meanings.sent4: His unifaces revealed nothing, hiding his true emotions behind a mask.
meanings.sent5: The painting depicted a creature with multiple unifaces, each expressing a different emotion.
